TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ILEmitter extends System.Object

Docs.summary: This class contains methods used for emitting opcodes to the current IL generator.

Docs.param: The type to constrain the next 'callvirt' to.
Docs.remarks: Emit only before a 'callvirt' that calls a virtual method on a valuetype. WORKS PROPERLY ONLY UNDER MONO. On .NET use a call instead of constrained with callvirt (works properly on both VMs).

Docs.param: The index of the argument to load.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static void EmitLdarga(int32 num) cil managed

Docs.param: The index of the argument whose address is required.
Docs.remarks: If the actual argument locations's stored value is needed use EmitLdarg isntead.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static void EmitLdcBool(bool b) cil managed

Docs.param: The boolean value to emit a load for.
Docs.summary: Emits 'ldc.i4.1' or 'ldc.i4.0' for true or false respectively.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static void EmitLdcChar(char c) cil managed

Docs.param: The character to emit a load for.
Docs.summary: Emits one of the variants of 'ldc.i4' opcode using the numerical unicode value of the character as the integer loaded.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static void EmitLdcI1(int8 n) cil managed

Docs.param: The int8 number to emit a load for.
Docs.summary: Emits one of the variants of 'ldc.i4' followed by a 'conv.i1'.

Docs.param: The int32 number to emit a load for.

Docs.param: The int64 number to emit a load for.
Docs.summary: Emits one of the variants of 'ldc.i4' followed by a 'conv.i8' or an 'ldc.i8' accordingly.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static void EmitLdfld(class System.Reflection.FieldInfo fld) cil managed

Docs.param: The instance field to load.
Docs.remarks: An instance of a class must be loaded prior to this emission. If a static field is to be loaded use EmitLdsfld instead. If the address is required use EmitLdflda instead.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static void EmitLdflda(class System.Reflection.FieldInfo fld) cil managed

Docs.param: The instance field whose address is required.
Docs.remarks: An instance of a class must be loaded prior to this emission.If the actual value is required use EmitLdfld instead. If the address of a static field is required use EmitLdsflda.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static void EmitLdftn(class System.Reflection.MethodInfo met) cil managed

Docs.param: The static method to which a pointer is needed.
Docs.remarks: If the pointer to an instance method is needed use EmitLdvirtftn instead.

Docs.param: The index of the location to load.
Docs.summary: Emits one of the variants of the 'ldloc' opcode.
Docs.remarks: If the address to the location is needed use EmitLdloca instead.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static void EmitLdloca(int32 num) cil managed

Docs.param: The index of the location whose address is needed.
Docs.summary: Emits one of the variants of the 'ldloca' opcode.
Docs.remarks: If the actual value is needed use EmitLdloc instead.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static void EmitLdnull() cil managed

Docs.param: The static field to load.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static void EmitLdsflda(class System.Reflection.FieldInfo fld) cil managed

Docs.param: The static field whose address is required.
Docs.remarks: If the actual value of the field is needed use EmitLdsfld instead.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static void EmitLdstr(string str) cil managed

Docs.param: The string constant to load.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static void EmitLdtoken(class System.Type t) cil managed

Docs.param: The type whose token is needed.
Docs.remarks: Useful for gettype/typeof implementation and in calling castclass.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static void EmitLdvirtftn(class System.Reflection.MethodInfo met) cil managed

Docs.param: The instance method whose pointer is needed.
Docs.remarks: An isntance of a class must be loaded prior to this emission. If the pointer to a static method is required use EmitLdftn instead.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static void EmitLike() cil managed

Docs.remarks: Useful to compare strings against a pattern. This adds an implicit reference to System.dll!!!

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static void EmitMul(bool s) cil managed

Docs.param: If the operands are signed or not.
Docs.summary: Emits one of the variants of the 'mul' opcode.
Docs.remarks: Multiplies its operands.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static void EmitNand() cil managed

Docs.remarks: Applies a 1's complemented 'and' to its operands (nand).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static void EmitNeg() cil managed

Docs.remarks: Does a 2's complement negation on its operand.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static void EmitNewarr(class System.Type t) cil managed

Docs.param: The type of the array to make.
Docs.remarks: Useful for making arrays. The length of the array of type IntPtr must be loaded prior to this emission

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static void EmitNewobj(class System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo c) cil managed

Docs.param: The constructor to call.
Docs.remarks: Useful for producing object instances.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static void EmitNLike() cil managed

Docs.summary: Emits a sequence of Regex.IsMatch, 'ldc.i4.0' and 'ceq' .
Docs.remarks: Useul to check if a string does not conform to a pattern (notlike).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static void EmitNor() cil managed

Docs.remarks: dpes a 1's complemented 'or' (nor) on its operands.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static void EmitNot() cil managed

Docs.remarks: For booleans consider using 'ldc.i4.0' followed by a 'ceq' instead i.e. use EmitLdcI4(0) and EmitCeq.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static void EmitOr() cil managed

Docs.remarks: Does an inclusive 'or' on its opcode.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static void EmitPop() cil managed

Docs.remarks: Usful when a value on the stack is not needed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static void EmitRem(bool s) cil managed

Docs.param: If the operands are signed or not.
Docs.remarks: Does a modulo operantion on the operands (%).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static void EmitRet() cil managed

Docs.remarks: Useful for returning the control to the method which called this one.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static void EmitStrAdd() cil managed

Docs.remarks: Useful for supporting string concatenation as addition of strings.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static void EmitStrCeq() cil managed

Docs.summary: Emits a combination of String.Compare, 'ldc.i4.0' and 'ceq'.
Docs.remarks: Checks if two strings are equal. The use of the Equality overload in System.String is preferred over this.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static void EmitStrCneq() cil managed

Docs.summary: Emits a combination of String.Compare, 'ldc.i4.0','ceq','ldc.i4.0' and 'ceq'.
Docs.remarks: Checks if two strings are not equal. The use of the Inequality overload in System.String is preferred over this.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static void EmitStsfld(class System.Reflection.FieldInfo fld) cil managed

Docs.param: The static field to store in.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static void EmitSub(bool s) cil managed

Docs.param: If the operands are signed or not.
Docs.summary: Emits one of the variants of the 'sub' opcode.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static void EmitUnbox(class System.Type t) cil managed

Docs.param: The valuetype type to unbox to.
Docs.remarks: This just gives a managed pointer to the valuetype inside the boxed object. To get the valuetype itself use EmitUnboxAny instead.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static void EmitUnboxAny(class System.Type t) cil managed

Docs.param: The type to unbox/cast to.
Docs.remarks: This unoxes the valuetype completely or if the reference is to a reference type casts it to the specified type.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static void EmitXnor() cil managed

Docs.remarks: Does a 1's complemented 'xor' (xnor) on its operands.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static void EmitXor() cil managed

Docs.remarks: Does an exclusive 'or' (xor) on its operands .
All the Emit methods use the generator held here.
